segments.text: Please file all the reports for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Would you like to file them according to dates ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Will you also make copies and file them using both methods ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Can you please also list all the documents in those old files ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When do you expect it to be finished ?
segments.speaker: S2
